DOC.brief_summary: This study assess efficacy , safety tolerability co-administration NVA237 plus indacaterol take daily versus indacaterol take daily patient moderate severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety Tolerability Co-administration NVA237 Plus Indacaterol Once Daily Versus Indacaterol Once Daily Patients With Moderate Severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.criteria: Patients moderate severe stable Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease ( COPD ) Stage II Stage III accord Global Initiative Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease ( GOLD ) Guidelines . Patients postbronchodilator force expiratory volume 1 second ( FEV1 ) â‰¥ 30 % and/or < 80 % predict normal , postbronchodilator FEV1/Forced Vital Capacity ( FVC ) < 0.70 screening . Current exsmokers smoke history least 10 pack year Symptomatic patient accord daily diary data . Pregnant nursing ( lactate ) woman . Women childbearing potential unless use adequate contraception . Patients Type I uncontrolled Type II diabetes . Patients history long time interval start Q wave end T wave heart 's electrical cycle ( QT ) syndrome whose QT correct heart rate ( QTc ) measure screen ( Visit 2 ) ( Fridericia 's method ) prolong Patients paroxysmal ( e.g . intermittent ) atrial fibrillation Patients clinically significant electrocardiogram ( ECG ) laboratory abnormality screening ( Visit 2 ) Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
